text: Amizir atrivim bagha zuim, a guaratɨzimɨn ikɨ mangɨtɨ amɨnim dutugham. Eghtɨ amɨmzaraghan me a inigh mangɨ amizibar dɨpenir igharazimɨn Sasgasɨn dafarim datɨgham. Sasgas, an atrivimɨn amuir dozibar dɨpenimɨn garir gumazim. Amuir kam uam atrivim bagh mangan kogham. Atrivim a gifueghɨva an ziam dɨborogh an diaghtɨma a mangam. Tuaviba ua puvatɨ.
